score": 1,       "id": "240a98f5-90c9-406b-a8c8-f50ff86f116c",       "palette": "primary colors",       "color_names": [         "blue",         "red",         "yellow"       ],       "color_mediums": [         "[\"acrylic\",\"oil\",\"pastel\"]",         "[\"acrylic\",\"pastel\",\"watercolor\"]",         "[\"acrylic\",\"watercolor\"]"       ]     }   ] } See alsoExtract text and information fromimages in AI enrichmentArticle•08/30/2022Through AI enrichment, Azure Cognitive Search gives you several options for creatingand extracting searchable text from images, including:
